casebody.data:
In the Matter of ENGLANDER SPRING BED CO., Inc., Debtor-Appellee; Anna P. Zalkin, Celia Fitzgerald, and Margaret H. Felter, Appellants. No. 184. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 22, 1936. Zalkin & Cohen, of New York City (Harry Zalkin and Israel Akselrod, both of New York City, of counsel), for creditors-appellants. Lewis, Marks & Kanter, of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Lloyd B. Kanter, of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for debtor. Edwin M. Slote, of New York City, for Creditors’ Committee.

•Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order (17 F.Supp. 15), affirmed.
